version_description:
Your feedback is important to us, and we’ve worked to fix the following bugs as quickly as possible:

- Fixed a bug to prevent the app from freezing on iPhone 6 Plus, 6S Plus, and 7 Plus
- Fixed a bug preventing surge amounts from showing on the map 
- Fixed a bug to stop voice guidance overlaps when using third-party navigation apps
- Fixed a bug to stop interruptions in music and improve bluetooth audio pairing. 

It doesn’t end here. We're constantly fixing bugs and issues in the app that affect your driving experience. To give us feedback, or report an issue, go to Help in the Uber driver app, or visit help.uber.com. Thanks for driving with Uber!

We update the app as often as possible to make it more reliable and improve your driving experience. Check back next week to see the latest features and fixes available.

Thanks for driving with Uber! We update the app as often as possible to make it more reliable and improve your driving experience. Check back next week for any new features and important fixes.

We've redesigned navigation to better suit the needs of driving with Uber. Check out the newest features! Experience optimized time between trips, smoother pick-ups and more—without ever leaving the Uber Driver app.

You can look forward to:
- Reduced eye-strain: nightmode minimizes the brightness of your screen to help your eyes adjust at night
- Color-coded traffic alerts: monitor heavy traffic (in red), moderate traffic (in yellow), and normal traffic (in blue) to and from trips
- Turn-by-turn navigation: be prepared and receive guidance for upcoming lane changes so you can switch lanes safely and easily

These are just the first steps to the changes we're making to navigation. We’ll continue updating the app as often as possible to make it more reliable while improving your driving experience. Check back soon for any new features and important fixes.

Introducing the new Driver app | Your partner on the road

The new Driver app helps you earn smarter with real-time information. Easier to use and more reliable, the app now supports you—like a partner—at every turn.

We've added a bunch of new features in this release:
- Track your earnings at a glance - Easily track your progress toward your daily and weekly earning goals. You can also access your earning summaries with just a tap.
- Plan your day with ease - See hourly trends, set preferences, view promotions and go offline—all in one place.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber Driver engine running.
Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.

- Improved localization accuracy across the app
